content: To put this opportunity into perspective, just considering our current North America local customer base, if we were able to return to the customer frequency and retention levels we saw in 2018 and 2019 time frame, we could capture nearly $250 million in incremental revenue. Within our North America customer base, we had 10.5 million active local customers in the second quarter, up 1% year-over-year. And within our international markets, we had 5 million active local customers in the second quarter, which represented a growth of 22% year-over-year.
